actions.name: Corridors of Time (Reaction)

cost.trigger: The user would be affected by a declared Action, Attack, or Ability.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user would be affected by a declared Action, Attack, or Ability.

Effect: The user targets the source of Triggering effect, causing them to Flinch. The user is unaffected by the Triggering effect, and then user gains +6 EVA for 2 activations.

actions.name: Corridors of Time (Action)

cost.trigger: The user declares an Action or Ability that consumes at least one Simple Action.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user declares an Action or Ability that consumes at least one Simple Action.

Effect: Connection - Roar of Time. The number of Simple Actions the Triggering Action consumes are reduced by 1 ([Exhaust] Actions instead just lose [Exhaust]).

system.description:
Trigger: The user would be affected by a declared Action, Attack, or Ability.
Effect: Connection - Roar of Time. The triggering effect does not affect the user, and effect's source is @Affliction[flinched] 5. Then user gains +6 EVA for 2 activations. When the user declares an Action or Ability that consumes at least one Simple Action, the user may spend 4 PP to reduce the number of Simple Actions that Action consumes by 1 ([Exhaust] Actions instead just lose [Exhaust]).
